text: Khloe Kardashian may come off as a softie on Keeping Up WIth The Kardashians. But on her spinoff show Revenge Body With Khloe Kardashian, she's much tougher, as was witnesses on Monday when she asked one contestant to leave. The 33 - year - old pregnant star told Joel to pack up his things after he was caught in lies. On Twitter the next day Khloe said :'So disrespectful!! Joel totally played us... and we have no time for fakers!!'Please go : Khloe Kardashian fired Joel from her show Revenge Body on Monday Not truthful : The contestant had lied about his ex Jose having Leukemia Tough talk : The 33 - year - old sire
